t: Amazon S3 exception: "The specified key does not exist" - Stack Overflow
New brand name replacing Generic - whats a Key Attribute ?
s: I wanted to edit one of my current live listings to state my brand name rather than Generic which is currently displayed. When i try to do this the following pop up message appears and i don't understand it. Especially the bit I have highlighted in bold, what's a Key Attribute, where do i find it ?

t: Amazon Brand Registry and Its Benefits For Sellers | OperationROI
s: March 9, 2021 - This must be done for every single product in your brand and none of them can be listed the same way or use the same attributes. If you do not list a key attribute then Amazon will identify one for you. Going forward there will be two ways to list existing products into your Brand Registry.

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).
